AT.name: Japanese Rail Sim 3D Monorail Trip to Okinawa
AT.description: Das Spiel ist auf der Yui Rail angesiedelt, einer Bahnlinie in der tropischen Atmosphäre der Präfektur Okinawa, dem südlichsten Teil Japans. Die Einschienenbahn fährt auf einer Strecke von insgesamt 12,9 km. Der gesamte Schienenweg der Yui Rail verläuft auf einer hochgelegenen Brücke! Aus einer Höhe von 20 Metern kannst du aus dem Fenster sehen und das Gefühl genießen, über der Stadt zu spazieren. Du kannst auch gleichzeitig im Nachtmodus aufnehmen. Im Nachtmodus kannst du die wunderschönen Lichter der Stadt bei Nacht betrachten. Einfach zu bedienen! Mit nur einem Regler steuerst du die Stromzufuhr und die Bremsen. Erhalte eine gute Bewertung, indem du besonders auf die Geschwindigkeitsbegrenzung achtest, während du steile Abhänge und Kurven meisterst. Genieße deine Zeit als Zugfahrer und die schöne Aussicht über Okinawa auf der hochgelegenen Brücke.

AU.name: Japanese Rail Sim 3D Monorail Trip to Okinawa
AU.description: This game is set on the Yui Rail, a railway located at the southern most point of Japan amidst the tropical atmosphere of Okinawa prefecture. The monorail travels along a grand total of 12.9 kilometers of railway. The Yui Rail runs entirely on an elevated railway! From a height of 20 metres from the ground, you can look out the window and feel like you are taking a walk above the city. Night Mode is also included. Changing from Day Mode, enjoy the peaceful glittering lights of the city at night. Simple to operate! With just one lever you can easily control power and breaking. Aim for a high rating by paying extra attention to the speed limit as you take on the steep slopes and sudden curves with the monorail! Enjoy your time as a monorail conductor as you take in the refreshing view while speeding across the elevated railway.

BG.name: Japanese Rail Sim 3D Monorail Trip to Okinawa
BG.description: This game is set on the Yui Rail, a railway located at the southern most point of Japan amidst the tropical atmosphere of Okinawa prefecture. Changing from Day Mode, enjoy the peaceful glittering lights of the city at night. Simple to operate! With just one lever you can easily control power and breaking. Aim for a high rating by paying extra attention to the speed limit as you take on the steep slopes and sudden curves with the monorail! Enjoy your time as a monorail conductor as you take in the refreshing view while speeding across the elevated railway.

BE.name: Japanese Rail Sim 3D Monorail Trip to Okinawa
BE.description: Le jeu est centré sur Yui Rail, une ligne ferroviaire se trouvant à l'extrémité sud du Japon, au cœur de l'atmosphère tropicale de la préfecture d'Okinawa. Le monorail s'étend sur un total de 12,9 kilomètres de voies ferrées. La totalité des voies du Yui Rail se trouvent sur un viaduc ! À 20 mètres au-dessus du sol, il vous est possible de regarder par la fenêtre et d'admirer la vue dominante sur la ville. Un Mode Nuit est aussi disponible ! Offrant un paysage différent du Mode Jour, le Mode Nuit vous offre la vue paisible des lumières étincelantes de la ville la nuit. Facile à manœuvrer ! Prenez le contrôle de la traction et du freinage à l'aide d'un seul et même levier ! Soyez attentif aux limites de vitesse lorsque vous négociez pentes raides et virages serrés avec le monorail afin d'obtenir la meilleure note ! Profitez de votre rôle de conducteur de monorail en appréciant la vue alors que vous parcourez le viaduc ferroviaire !

ES.name: Japanese Rail Sim 3D Monorail Trip to Okinawa
ES.description: Este juego transcurre en Yui Rail, una línea situada en el punto más al sur de Japón, rodeada de la atmósfera tropical de la prefectura de Okinawa. El monorail recorre un gran total de 12,9 kilómetros de vías. ¡Las vías de Yui Rail se encuentran, en su totalidad, sobre un puente elevado! A una altura de 20 metros sobre el suelo, puedes mirar por la ventana y sentirte como si estuvieras paseando sobre la ciudad. También incluye el Modo de Noche. Si cambias el Modo de Día, puedes disfrutar del tranquilizador resplandor nocturno de las luces de la ciudad. ¡Sencillo de manejar! Controla la potencia y los frenos con una sola palanca. Intenta conseguir calificaciones altas y presta atención extra al límite de velocidad cuando llegues a pendientes pronunciadas o curvas repentinas con el monorail. Disfruta como conductor de monorail mientras disfrutas de las refrescantes vistas al pasear a toda velocidad por el puente elevado.

IT.name: Japanese Rail Sim 3D Monorail Trip to Okinawa
IT.description: Il gioco si svolge lungo la Yui Rail, una ferrovia situata all'estremo sud del Giappone, immersa nell'atmosfera tropicale della prefettura di Okinawa. La monorotaia viaggia per un totale di circa 12,9 km di strada ferrata. I binari della Yui Rail si trovano tutti su un ponte elevato! Da un'altezza di 20 m da terra, potrai osservare il paesaggio dal finestrino e sarà come sorvolare la città. Il gioco include una modalità notturna. Cambiando modalità potrai goderti le scintillanti luci notturne della città. Facile da comandare! Con una sola leva puoi controllare l'acceleratore e il freno. Ottieni punteggi alti osservando attentamente i limiti di velocità lungo le pendenze e le curve improvvise. Divertiti nel tuo ruolo di conducente di monorotaia e goditi la magnifica vista che ti scorre davanti dall'alto del ponte elevato.

PT.name: Japanese Rail Sim 3D Monorail Trip to Okinawa
PT.description: O jogo é baseado nos trilhos de Yui, uma ferrovia localizada no ponto mais meridional do Japão no meio da atmosfera tropical da província de Okinawa. O monotrilho viaja ao longo de um total de 12,9 km de ferrovias. Os trilhos de Yui correm enteiramento sobre uma ferrovia elevada! De uma altura de 20 metros do chão, você pode olhar pela janela e sentir como se estivesse dando uma volta pela cidade. O Modo Noite também está incluso. Troque o Modo Dia e desfrute das tranquilas luzes cintilantes da cidade à noite. Fácil de operar! Com apenas uma alavanca você pode controlar a potência e os freios. Almeje uma alta classificação redobrando a atenção no limite de velocidade nos declives acentuados e curtas inesperadas com o monotrilho! Aproveite suas horas como condutor de monotrilho ao mesmo tempo que desfruta do deslumbrante panorama enquanto acelera sobre a ferrovia elevada.

ZA.name: Japanese Rail Sim 3D Monorail Trip to Okinawa
ZA.description: This game is set on the Yui Rail, a railway located at the southern most point of Japan amidst the tropical atmosphere of Okinawa prefecture. The monorail travels along a grand total of 12.9 kilometers of railway. The Yui Rail runs entirely on an elevated railway! From a height of 20 metres from the ground, you can look out the window and feel like you are taking a walk above the city. Night Mode is also included. Changing from Day Mode, enjoy the peaceful glittering lights of the city at night. Simple to operate! With just one lever you can easily control power and breaking. Aim for a high rating by paying extra attention to the speed limit as you take on the steep slopes and sudden curves with the monorail! Enjoy your time as a monorail conductor as you take in the refreshing view while speeding across the elevated railway.
